GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object of given article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on a given article_id

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: edits article vote by specified amount then serves the article object. Requires object of the form {inc_vote : <integer>}

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment object to a given article. Requires object of the form {username: <string>, body: <string>}

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment object, returns nothing.
